MojiMoji

JavaScript, Google Chrome Extension, CSS

MojiMoji is a Google Chrome browser extension to auto-detect and fill an emoji into your text input areas. Get predictive emoji suggestions, replace your text. Get phone emoji insert expirience in your browser! (build in progress)

Matter.js Demo

JavaScript, MatterJs, Bootstrap

Showcase app of Matter.js library. Generate random shapes, generate shapes with random characteristics of defined shape or create your own using canvas inbuilt solution. Infinite spin, direction of spin and limitation control with custom state management. Nice to play and watch.

Live
GitHub

Libtrack

React, Node.js, Express, MongoDb, Google Books API, Material UI

Track your book journey with Libtrack. Search, add and modify status of books you read or reading. Full stack application with full cycle of registration, authorisation and cache management. Find books available with Google API and add them to your library.

Live
